question: Shenzhen Huntkey Chiyuan Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

response.query: Shenzhen Huntkey Chiyuan Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: Profile - Huntkey Group
results.content: Profile Headquartered in Shenzhen, established in 1995, Huntkey Group (Huntkey) is a member of the International Power Supply Manufacturers Association (PSMA), a vice chairman of the Chinese Power Supply Society (CPSS), and a member of the China Electric Vehicle Charging Technology and Industry Alliance.
results.raw_content:
Profile
Headquartered in Shenzhen, established in 1995, Huntkey Group (Huntkey) is a member of the International Power Supply Manufacturers Association (PSMA), a vice chairman of the Chinese Power Supply Society (CPSS), and a member of the China Electric Vehicle Charging Technology and Industry Alliance. Huntkey has branches in the United States, Japan and other places, and has cooperative factories in Brazil, Argentina and other countries. Huntkey independently designs, develops, and manufactures IT products such as switching power supplies, computer cases, monitors, adapters; consumer products such as mobile electronic product chargers, travel chargers and other; smart home products such as smart power strips, small appliances, LED lighting and other. In addition to the above product lines, there are also charging piles, new energy vehicle power supplies (chargers, DC/DC, etc.)
With its own technology and manufacturing strength, Huntkey has served Lenovo, Haier, HP, DELL, BESTBUY, OPPO, VIVO and other companies for many years, and has won unanimous recognition and full trust from itscustomers. Huntkey is a powerful supplier in the power supply industry.
At present, Huntkey owns nearly one million square meters of industrial parks in Shenzhen, Heyuan and Hefei.
Huntkey (Shenzhen) Industrial Park was completed in 2003 and is the earliest R&D and production base of Huntkey. It has a reliability laboratory, a material laboratory, a functional laboratory, an optical laboratory, a simulation laboratory, a safety laboratory, an electromagnetic compatibility laboratory, an acoustic laboratory, HALT and other professional laboratories and testing centers. The laboratory and testing center mainly focus on new material testing, experimental technology application, product function testing and other fields. In 2012, Huntkey lab has passed the accreditation of China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS). It is a municipal research and development center in Shenzhen and owns German TUV, Norwegian Nemko, American FCC, National Standard 9254 authorized laboratories, with TUV, CE, UL and Thiel and other international certification capabilities.
Huntkey (Heyuan) Industrial Park is located in Longling Industrial Zone, Yuancheng District in Heyuan City. It is an important transportation town in the northeast of Guangdong. Heyuan Industrial Park is an important R&D, production and supporting base of Huntkey. It focuses on the research and development, production and sales of computer cases, consumer and small household appliances. The supporting products include hardware, plastics, electronic assembly, transformers, wires, fans, etc.
Huntkey (Hefei) Industrial Park is located in the state-level Economic and Technological Development Zone in Hefei. It adjacent to the beautiful Nanyan Lake, covering an area of more than 500 acres. The industrial park focuses on the R&D and manufacturing of smart home appliances, new energy and automotive electronics, power supplies and display related products, aiming to provide customers with innovative design and manufacturing services for intelligent complete module solutions.
At present, the Hefei Industrial Park mainly serves many well-known brands such as Lenovo, Whirlpool, Haier, Midea, and Chery.
Since the establishment of the Industrial Park in 2010, it has long been committed to building the park into an implementation platform and industrial base for the full value chain (research, production, supply, sales, and testing) of related intelligent hardware.
The Industrial Park has a number of independent business entities including national high-tech enterprises, as well as provincial and municipal enterprise technology centers and engineering technology centers. At the same time, the perfect quality system (ISO9001 and TS16949) and advanced smart lean manufacturing system with advanced technologies, reliable quality and excellent performance, which are highly recognized by customers.
航嘉，用心传递正能量
Huntkey Industrial Park, Xuexiang, Ban Tian, Shenzhen, 518129, China
+86-755-8960 6666

results.title: Consumer Electronics supplier & Computer power | About Huntkey
results.content: About Huntkey. Founded in 1995, Huntkey is a leading global provider of power strips, surge protectors, power supplies, adapters, chargers, monitors and air purifiers. Huntkey is an Asia renowned brand, a member of The International Power Supply Manufacturer's Association (PSMA) and China Power Supply Society (CPSS).
results.raw_content:
Menu
About Huntkey
Founded in 1995, Huntkey is a leading global provider of power strips, surge protectors, power supplies, adapters, chargers, monitors and air purifiers. Huntkey is an Asia renowned brand, a member of The International Power Supply Manufacturer’s Association (PSMA) and China Power Supply Society (CPSS). With vision and endeavor to make people’s daily lives simpler and better, Huntkey has established its advanced R&D system to provide hundreds of millions of customers with intelligent products, giving them revolutionary user experience.
Including three total nearly 1,000,000 square meters industrial parks, Huntkey is one of the most famous brands and largest companies in mainland China. It is headquartered in Shenzhen, with branch companies in the US, Japan and Hong Kong, and with cooperating factories in Brazil, Argentina and India. In order to fulfill customers’ expectations, Huntkey has created comprehensive range of high-standard products & solutions, and has built up value-adding, strong relationships with business partners all around the world.
Since its establishment more than 20 years ago, Huntkey is inspired by its commitment that delivers value to our customers. At Huntkey, we strive to create innovative products that make people’s lives better and easier. We believe that the best way to do this, is through deep understanding of customers’ needs & desires.
Huntkey Campus
Huntkey Campus
Global Presence
Huntkey is relentless in the pursuit of the latest technologies, the highest quality standards and in delivering the best user experience possible. We design, manufacture, and distribute an extensive portfolio of the finest products to our world-wide customers, making their lives better and more convenient. With operations across the globe, we deeply understand their needs, and stick to our promise that provides them with the best products & services at any time, any where.
Certifications
At Huntkey, we believe the true innovation is all about creating, renewing or improving more effective products that make life better. To assure customers of reliable and the highest products possible from beginning to end, We are dedicated to lifting our quality standards without limits. Our products have been accredited with major international system certifications – ISO9001 2008, ISO14001 2004, OHSAS18001 2007, QC080000 2012, TS16949 2009, quality management system certification, CB, UL, ETL, CSA, FCC, CE, RoHS, TUV, GS, BS, RCM, SAA, C-Tick, CCC, CCEE, CNAS, etc.
Our Culture
Our VisionTo become a respectable company by providing branded products & services ofsuperior quality.
Business PhilosophyTo create, pass, pursue and realize value.
Management ConceptResult oriented, effort shared, united for progress, and dedicated to performance.
Partnerships
Partnerships are a key enabler for meeting global challenges. Partnerships are firmly embedded in our way of working at global, regional and national levels. By joining forces with our partners, we can promote all our ideals and values to achieve common development goals, and to strengthen visibility and impact of our action. Learn more about some of our partners below.
FOLLOW US

results.title: Huntkey Receives Acclaim for Its Visionary Low-Carbon - GlobeNewswire
results.content: Follow SHENZHEN, China, Sept. 14, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In an era where environmental issues are becoming increasingly severe, Shenzhen Huntkey Electric Co., Ltd., a pioneering brand...
results.raw_content:
Huntkey Receives Acclaim for Its Visionary Low-Carbon Strategies in the Electronics Industry
September 14, 2023 10:30 ET
| Source:
Shenzhen Huntkey Electric Co., Ltd.
Shenzhen Huntkey Electric Co., Ltd.
SHENZHEN, China, Sept.
14, 2023
(GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In an era where environmental issues are becoming increasingly severe, Shenzhen Huntkey Electric Co., Ltd., a pioneering brand in the electronics industry, has consistently upheld a firm commitment to low-carbon practices. With a profound focus on sustainable development, the company's innovative efforts have garnered acclaim and established a new benchmark for eco-friendly power solutions.
Huntkey's low-carbon strategies exemplify its forward-thinking approach. From product manufacturing, research and development, and testing to packaging, Huntkey's low-carbon practices encompass the entire product lifecycle. Regarding packaging materials, Huntkey strictly controls substances like lead, mercury, and hexavalent cadmium that pose risks to human health and the environment. The raw materials and components used are in compliance with RoHS environmental certification, and excessive packaging is minimized to ensure sustainability.
In terms of functionality, Huntkey's intelligent power strip SST307 incorporates USB charging ports, addressing the issue of redundant charging functionalities. Other sockets from Huntkey, such as SSH608, SSH601-2, and SSH504, feature protection against electric shock, overheating, overcharging, overcurrent, and overload. These safeguards effectively prolong the lifespan of the devices, ensuring the safety of both the electronics and the power strips.
Huntkey's pioneering efforts have garnered widespread attention, earning multiple prestigious awards in the field of sustainable development. For instance, Huntkey was selected for the 2022 Green Manufacturing List by China's Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and was honored with the seventh batch of Green Product accolades. This signifies Huntkey's alignment with the "dual-carbon" objectives, taking a firm step toward promoting industrial green, low-carbon circular transformation and development.
Huntkey leads the electronics industry towards a green future through comprehensive low-carbon strategies, impressive award achievements, and innovative products. The company is dedicated to reducing carbon emissions while delivering cutting-edge electronic products, sending a clear message: environmental responsibility and technological advancement can progress hand in hand.
About HuntkeyHuntkey is a high-tech enterprise headquartered in Shenzhen, China, specializing in researching and producing a wide range of energy-efficient and environmentally friendly power supply products. Huntkey has always been committed to providing users with green and eco-friendly power solutions through technological innovation, and it holds a leading position in China's low-carbon and environmental technology sector.
Media ContactCompany Name: Shenzhen Huntkey Electric Co., Ltd. Website: https://en.huntkey.comTelephone: 86-755-8960-6545Media email: marketing@huntkey.com Sales email: huntkey@huntkey.com
Tags

About us
Huntkey: All About Power.
Business Contact: huntkey@huntkeydiy.com.
Huntkey Enterprise Group, founded in 1995, is a professional provider specialized in the development, design, manufacturing and marketing of power supplies. The products of Huntkey cover a wide variety, including power supplies (1W~250KW), power systems, computer cases, universal notebook adapters, chargers, power supply converters, air purifier, LED products, etc. The industrial parks of Huntkey in Shenzhen and Heyuan and Hefei which cover a total area of over 750,000 square meters, are now the largest IT manufacturing base in China's mainland. Huntkey with over 15,000 employees has set up its branch companies in Hong Kong, Japan and Europe. Its clients are found all over the world in more than 30 countries and regions.

Future with tradition – made in Germany
Janitza LP is the North American arm of Janitza electronics GmbH, a leading German manufacturer of electrical power monitoring hardware and software. With Janitza solutions, customers can evaluate the quality of power in their facility and take action to reduce energy costs, improve uptime, and make operations more sustainable. Janitza North America LP was established in 2019 and recently opened its US headquarters in Ashburn, Virginia.

Who We Are

What We Offer
DXC Technology Co - Company Profile
Powered by
All the data and insights you need on DXC Technology Co in one report.
DXC Technology Co: Overview
DXC Technology Co (DXC) is an information technology (IT) and consulting services provider. The company’s service portfolio includes analytics, cloud applications, cloud infrastructure, enterprise applications, data security services, IT outsourcing (ITO), and workplace and mobility solutions. Its solutions are primarily focused on minimizing business risks and operational costs for clients. DXC caters to the insurance, healthcare and life sciences, aerospace and defense, consumer and retail, manufacturing and automotive, travel and transportation, hospitality, energy, utilities, oil and gas, technology, media and telecommunications, public, banking, and capital sectors. The company’s operations are spread across various regions including the Americas, Australia, and Europe. DXC is headquartered in Ashburn, Virginia, the US.
